description:
<h1><strong><span>Access Performance Validation Officer</span></strong></h1>
<p>We are looking for a highly motivated, hardworking person to provide a comprehensive RTT support to help deliver an efficient administrative service on a 3 month fixed term contract.<br /> <br /> The post holder must be able to demonstrate experience of working in a similar role and have an understanding of RTT. They must be able to use their own initiative, respond to queries in a diplomatic and professional manner and demonstrate the ability to organise work to meet deadlines.<br /> <br /> Knowledge of 18 week RTT process is essential in this role but further training will be provided if required.</p>

hiringOrganization.name: Birmingham Women's and Children's NHS Foundation Trust

title: Access Performance Validation Officer
